select course_no as "no", course_name as "name", course_summary as "summary", course_detail as "detail", course_point as "point", lecturer_no as "lecturer.no", dept_no as "dept.no" from course where course_no = #value#

select course_no as "no", course_name as "name", course_summary as "summary", course_detail as "detail", course_point as "point", lecturer_no as "lecturer.no", dept_no as "dept.no" from course where dept_no = #value#

from COURSE A, LECTURER B, DEPT C,(select A.course_no as "countno",COUNT(*) as "qty" from course A, course_video B where A.COURSE_NO = B.COURSE_NO group by A.course_no) D where A.COURSE_NO = D."countno" and B.Lecturer_no = A.LECTURER_NO and A.DEPT_NO = C.dept_no;
